Articles.Content:
I have recently played the new For science! update and thought it were amazing and especially the science inventory was very cool but one thing was missing in my opinion:

 

Some kind of museum were you have a summary of all things you have learned on your missions such as temperatures , lifeforms, raw materials, biomes, you name it! mayby maps on diffrent planets with diffrent filters .

 

The museum or what to call it could be building it self when you explore and find more stuff.     I think this will give the game an even better story that the player decides by doing diffrent research on diffrent planets in whatever order you like!

I also want to say that I love the game as it is but this would be really nice wouldn`t it?

 

 

Edited December 20, 2023 by LarcasanKerman
